com.netflix.genie.server.services

Interface ClusterConfigService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PersistentClusterConfigImpl

    public interface ClusterConfigService
    Abstraction layer to encapsulate data ClusterConfig functionality.
    Classes implementing this abstraction layer must be thread-safe

    • Method Detail

      • getClusterConfig

        ClusterConfigResponse getClusterConfig(java.lang.String id)
        Gets the cluster config by id.
        Parameters:
        id - unique id of cluster config to return
        Returns:
        successful response, or one with HTTP error code

      • getClusterConfig

        ClusterConfigResponse getClusterConfig(java.lang.String id,
                                     java.lang.String name,
                                     Types.Configuration config,
                                     Types.Schedule schedule,
                                     Types.JobType jobType,
                                     Types.ClusterStatus status)
        Get the cluster config by various params.
        Parameters:
        id - unique id for cluster (can be a pattern)
        name - name of cluster (can be a pattern)
        config - configuration supported
        schedule - schedule supported
        jobType - job type supported
        status - status for cluster
        Returns:
        successful response, or one with HTTP error code

      • getClusterConfig

        ClusterConfigResponse getClusterConfig(java.lang.String id,
                                     java.lang.String name,
                                     java.lang.Boolean prod,
                                     java.lang.Boolean test,
                                     java.lang.Boolean unitTest,
                                     java.lang.Boolean adHoc,
                                     java.lang.Boolean sla,
                                     java.lang.Boolean bonus,
                                     java.lang.String jobType,
                                     java.util.List<java.lang.String> status,
                                     java.lang.Boolean hasStats,
                                     java.lang.Long minUpdateTime,
                                     java.lang.Long maxUpdateTime,
                                     java.lang.Integer limit,
                                     java.lang.Integer page)
        Get cluster info for various params Null parameters are ignored.
        Parameters:
        id - unique id for cluster
        name - cluster name
        prod - if cluster supports prod jobs
        test - if cluster supports test jobs
        unitTest - if cluster supports unitTest (dev) jobs
        adHoc - if cluster supports ad-hoc jobs
        sla - if cluster supports sla jobs
        bonus - if cluster supports bonus jobs
        status - valid types - Types.ClusterStatus
        hasStats - whether the cluster is logging statistics or not
        minUpdateTime - min time when cluster config was updated
        maxUpdateTime - max time when cluster config was updated
        limit - number of entries to return
        page - page number
        Returns:
        successful response, or one with HTTP error code

      • createClusterConfig

        ClusterConfigResponse createClusterConfig(ClusterConfigRequest request)
        Create new cluster config.
        Parameters:
        request -
        Returns:
        successful response, or one with HTTP error code

      • updateClusterConfig

        ClusterConfigResponse updateClusterConfig(ClusterConfigRequest request)
        Update/insert cluster config.
        Parameters:
        request - enscapsulates cluster config to upsert, must contain valid id
        Returns:
        successful response, or one with HTTP error code

      • deleteClusterConfig

        ClusterConfigResponse deleteClusterConfig(java.lang.String id)
        Delete a cluster config by id.
        Parameters:
        id - unique id for cluster to delete
        Returns:
        successful response, or one with HTTP error code
